VAN Der Valk viewers have been left distracted by very random accents in the Amsterdam-based ITV reboot.
The three-part series premiered on Sunday night, with actor Marc Warren starring as detective Simon 'Piet' Van der Valk.

articles.title: Here are the secret Netflix codes that unlock thousands of TV shows and movies - Edinburgh News
articles.content:
Deciding what to watch on Netflix can be time-consuming.
But what you might not know is that there are 'secret' codes to help you unlock niche categories - and there are reported to be more than 76,000 of these "micro-genres".

articles.title: Mamma Mia stars Meryl Streep and Christine Baranski reunite for Sondheim birthday concert - The Independent
articles.description: The pair sang ‘Ladies Who Lunch’ from ‘Company’ with Audra McDonald
articles.content:
